anniversary.title: 30 Years of Systemvetardagen
anniversary.body: This year marks the 30th annual Systemvetardagen, the premier tech job fair for students and professionals in the IT and System Science field! Organized by Studentkåren DISK, Systemvetardagen has been the go-to event for fostering connections between ambitious tech students and leading companies in Sweden. Whether you're looking for internships, full-time positions, or just want to explore the latest trends in IT, Systemvetardagen 2026 is the place to be.

meet.title: Book an Interview
meet.body: We're excited to launch our new platform where students can schedule interviews with companies during the fair! This innovative system makes it easier than ever to connect directly with recruiters and secure meaningful conversations about your future career. Get ahead of the competition by booking your interview slots in advance and make the most of your time at Systemvetardagen.

anniversary.subHeader: Three decades of connecting with top companies
anniversary.body: This year marks the <1>30th annual Systemvetardagen</1>, the premier tech job fair for students and professionals in the IT and System Science field! Organized by <2>Studentkåren DISK</2>, Systemvetardagen has been the go-to event for fostering connections between ambitious tech students and leading companies in Sweden.
anniversary.body2: Whether you're looking for internships, full-time positions, or just want to explore the latest trends in IT, <1>Systemvetardagen 2026</1> is the place to be. Join us for a day filled with networking, inspiring lectures, and exciting opportunities to meet your future colleagues.

fairie.body: Join the team that makes the fair possible! As a Fair'ie you'll help with the main logistics while still having plenty of time to enjoy everything the fair has to offer. Plus, you're invited to our special Thank You Party

help.body: Support logistics and ensure everything runs smoothly for visitors.

fair.body: You'll still have plenty of time to enjoy the events, booths and activities.

party.body: Celebrate with all Fair'ies at our exclusive appreciation party!

qr-codes.header: Book a speed dating session with a company

uppdated.body: Would you like to receive updates about Systemvetardagen with tailored information via email?
